channel.title: Walking! (For follow when attacking or just following)
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to move the player from the server? Sort of like teleportToX and Y but instead of teleporting just start making them walk like they clicked? I'm thinking this is pretty easy, but I just can't seem to find a way :confused:
I'm trying to make a working follow option :)
Found public static void updatePlayer(Player plr, stream str) in PlayerHandler.java , can I use this in client.java to make the player walk to a X and Y location?
Please someone, I almost got working following but I can't make the player walk to any new cords..... (Without Teleing)
